description: CLI tool that enables AI agents to access x402 payment-gated HTTP endpoints. Probes endpoints for payment requirements, signs USDC payments via EIP-3009, and returns structured JSON with the backend response. Works with any x402-compliant server including the x402-k8s-operator. Supports EVM networks: Base, Base Sepolia, Avalanche, and Avalanche Fuji.

EVM_PRIVATE_KEY.description: EVM private key for signing USDC payments via EIP-3009. Use a dedicated low-value wallet, not your main account.

permissions: network: outbound HTTPS to x402-gated endpoints and x402.org facilitator
